This workflow is used to build a docker image and push it to GHCR (GitHub Container Registry). It does not deploy the
image to the cluster.

Template
--------
name: build.push.only.lib.unb.ca

on:
  pull_request:
  push:
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  deploy:
    uses: unb-libraries/dockworker/.github/workflows/build-push.yaml@6.x
    with:
      push-branches: '["prod"]'
    secrets:
      SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL: ${{ secrets.SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL }}
